mutants.original_line: string = ''.join(char for char in string if char.isalpha())
mutants.mutated_line: string = 'MUTATED'.join((char for char in string if char.isalpha()))
mutants.code:
def unique_characters(string):
    string = 'MUTATED'.join((char for char in string if char.isalpha()))
    unique_chars = set(string)
    sorted_chars = sorted(unique_chars, reverse=True)
    return sorted_chars

def unique_characters(string):
    string = ''.join((char for char in string if char.isalpha()))
    unique_chars = set(string)
    sorted_chars = sorted(unique_chars, reverse=False)
    return sorted_chars
